education_text.0: Born in      The Hague The Hague, Bos studied      mathematics at the      University of Groningen University of Groningen, and wrote his PhD      thesis on Rapid user interface development with the script language GistBorn in      The Hague The Hague, Bos studied      mathematics at the      University of Groningen University of Groningen, and wrote his PhD      thesis on Rapid user interface development with the script language Gist
